name: Next Stop 2
description: We're off on another railroad journey! Margaret has new obligations to the bank. This time she has to yet again fix the broken parts of the railroad and build a whole city.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP / Vista / Win7/ Win8 / Win10 Processor: 1.6GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 216 MB available space
